House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04728
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING MORE STRINGENT POLICY ON GRANTING INDIVIDUALS PERMIT TO CARRY FIREARMS AND PRESCRIBING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF
ABSTRACT : Enumerates several series of tests and seminars that an individual should pass in order to be eligible to be granted permit to carry a firearm such as neuropsychiatric test; seminars on anger management, firearm safety, safe gun handling etiquette, proper handgun maintenance, situational awareness; and marksmanship training.
ALIAS NAME : "Strict Regulation for Securing Permit to Carry a Firearm Act"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, PRECIOUS HIPOLITO
DATE FILED : 2019-09-20
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
